wikipedia_page.main:
Euan Lloyd (6 December 1923 – 2 July 2016) was a British film producer. 
He married Audrey Clark, (Jane Hylton). Their daughter is Rosalind Lloyd. Getty Images shows the wedding photograph of Lloyd's second marriage to  Patricia Mahar, Patricia Donahue, dated the 17th of November, 1961. They had one child, Sam Donahue.
